snippet: Comcast said on Tuesday that its NBC Universal subsidiary had agreed to sell back its 15.8 percent stake in A&E Television Networks. The deal values A&E at about $19 billion.
abstract: Comcast said on Tuesday that its NBC Universal subsidiary had agreed to sell back its 15.8 percent stake in A&E Television Networks. The deal values A&E at about $19 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Comcast to Sell Back Its Stake in A&E for $3 Billion
